summary.Title: CEO - 7 DAYS Active
summary.Presentation:
- successful and fast-growing lifestyle brand

Established in the Spring of 2019, 7 DAYS Active is an activewear label dedicated to inspiring motion fo

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
- successful and fast-growing lifestyle brand

Established in the Spring of 2019, 7 DAYS Active is an activewear label dedicated to inspiring motion for the mind, body, and soul.

From its home in Copenhagen, 7 DAYS Active propels the agile and sporty mindset by providing functional and fashionable pieces, easily adapting to an active lifestyle across all arenas.

THE POSITION

As the coming CEO, you will be responsible for taking the company to the next level on an international growth journey. The current and expected growth rates for the products of the company are very high.

Your excellent skills in defining and executing growth strategies will be a point of difference, separating you from other candidates for this position.

The coming CEO should have the capability of bringing successful brands to their next level – candidates who know how to do this transformation from former positions at executive level are preferred. In addition, we prefer candidates that are futuristic in their mindset, with an understanding of business opportunities and trends.

You will work with a team of dedicated and competent colleagues, supported by the owners.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Develop the company with a focus on executing strategy plans and reaching budgets.
  • Ensure that processes are always efficient and at the same time ensure scalability.
  • Develop and maintain highly motivated and competent employees.
  • Ensure exploitation of digitalization opportunities during the growth journey.
  • Ensure a strong and smooth cooperation with the owners and business partners.
  • Being a visible and motivating CEO, showing the way through leadership.
  • Maintain and expand partnerships with onliners and retailers internationally.

PROFESSIONAL SKILLS

  • A proven track record with excellent results from design, lifestyle, fashion or similar.
  • International experience in executing growth strategies.
  • Understanding the entire value chain in a lifestyle company.
  • P&L experience from international companies.
  • Highly skilled communicator at all levels, internally as well as externally.
  • Commercial mind-set at a high level and a skilled, proactive problem solver.
  • Relevant commercial education.
  • Must be fluent in written and spoken English and possibly other languages.

PERSONAL SKILLS

  • You have a mature, informal and calm personality.
  • You are highly competitive and you possess a strong personal drive.
  • You have an energetic ”can-do” attitude.
  • You exude natural authority and are a role model to people around you.
  • You are a proactive person who creates enthusiasm.

WE ARE OFFERING

  • An attractive position at executive level in an innovative and successful company.
  • Great and competent employees supported by a truly dedicated and experienced board.
  • The opportunity to play a very central role on the future growth journey of a successful, international company with significant growth potential.
  • An executive position in a dynamic and entrepreneurial company.
  • Remuneration package at competitive level according to qualifications.

YOUR APPLICATION

UnikRecruitment assists the 7 DAYS Active with the recruitment process. No knowledge of the identity of the candidate will be given to the company without his or her prior acceptance. For further information on this vacancy, please contact Michael Kjærgaard, UnikRecruitment at phone no. +45 2222 4000 or e-mail mk@unikrecruitment.dk. We look forward to receiving your application and CV for this job in English language.

We encourage you to apply as quickly as possible - we will be interviewing candidates as we receive applications. Closing date for application is asap.
